tud.tangram.svgplot.svgpainter

Class SvgTitlePainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tud.tangram.svgplot.svgpainter.SvgPainter
      • tud.tangram.svgplot.svgpainter.SvgTitlePainter

  • public class SvgTitlePainter
extends SvgPainter
    This class is used for the very basic setup of the SVG files. It adds a background, the titles and computes the available space for the rest of the files.
